mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Henrietta Barnett School used to house The Institute, an adult education centre, but most of The Institute has now moved to accommodation in East Finchley, opposite the tube station, with the opening of a new purpose-built arts centre. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hampstead_Garden_Suburb [work]
